name: Crochet for Beginners: MYO Bracelet Workshop
description: Let's practice some fiber crafts together! At this beginner workshop, we are gonna learn the basic stiches of crocheting: chains, single and double crochets, slip stitch, etc. You are going to create with your own hands and (hopefully) come home with a beautiful hand-made bracelet! No previous experiences needed. We will supply the yarns and needles. You don't have to bring your own materials but an extra pair of siccors would always be appreciated!
